subject: FW: Flock - Evidence.com integration
body:
Good morning,
 
I spoke with our IT more in depth.  They will be able to get the necessary information to fill out the Flock integration box.  The screen shot below is what is on Axon�s side.  He is wanting clarification from your IT department about what specifically needs to be �allowed� for the files to be saved on the Axon server.
 
Detective D. DeWitt
Financial Crimes Unit
Special Weapons and Tactics Team
Background Investigations Team
Eugene Police Department
300 County Club Road
Eugene, OR 97401
Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.
Desk Phone � 541-682-2682
Work Cell � 541-743-6192
 

 
From: SHANNON Travis S <TShannon@eugene-or.gov> 
Sent: Thursday, April 10, 2025 2:17 PM
To: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov>
Subject: RE: Flock - Evidence.com integration
 
Yes, these are API settings that I can create.
 
I will need to know the proper permissions Flock needs. Here�s an example of the things I can enable:
 

 
 
Travis Shannon
Sr. Application Support Technician
Eugene Police Department
300 Country Club Road
Eugene, Oregon 97401
(541)-682-5806
 

 
From: DEWITT Derek A <DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov DDeWitt@eugene-or.gov > 
Sent: Thursday, April 10, 2025 14:14
To: SHANNON Travis S <TShannon@eugene-or.gov TShannon@eugene-or.gov >
Subject: Flock - Evidence.com integration
 
Travis,
 
When we get ready to link Evidence.com to Flock.  This is the information that we need to make it happen.  Do you have this available?
 
Derek
 
Detective D. DeWitt
Financial Crimes Unit
Special Weapons and Tactics Team
Background Investigations Team
Eugene Police Department
300 County Club Road
Eugene, OR 97401
Work hours: Tuesday - Friday 7:30 a.m. � 5:30 p.m.
Desk Phone � 541-682-2682
Work Cell � 541-743-6192
